Kickboxing & Fitness

Wing Chun Kung Fu

Kid’s Martial Arts

Sifu Justin Och

Regional director for Ving Tsun Athletic Association. Internationally trained in over 14 countries, the only school in Florida certified to teach in 4 Ip Man lineages.

2 WEEK FREE TRIAL & Access to our full schedule

Fill out the form below to get 2 FREE weeks of training at our downtown lakeland facility and access to our full class schedule!

Lakeland FL Wing Chun Kung Fu Martial Arts

What Makes us Different | APPOINTED World Ving Tsun Athletic Association Regional Director for the the SE U.S.A., Chief instructor Sifu Justin Och has the only Florida school certified to teach the entire Ip Man system under four direct lineages.    He has personal traveled to over 14+ countries seeking out Wing Chun Kung Fu Masters. Sifu Justin Och has been certified as a Wing Chun Black and Gold Sash instructor 3 times independently and is a 5th Degree Master Sifu.

What We Do | Our academy is very different by comparison to other martial arts schools because we are the only one in Central Florida with these credentials.  He’s certified to teach 4 Ip Man Lineages and the areas most widely traveled and trained SiFu.  We focus on real-world results while encouraging kids, adults, families, and individuals through both group and private lessons.

Get Started Now with a 2 Week Trial!

“If you’re looking for a place to come learn new techniques to better defend yourself, you found it! What brought me here was Wing Chun, what keeps me coming back are the people!

— Danny P.,

(student for 1 year +)

Meet Our Martial Art Instructors

(Check out our dedicated team of instructors, coaches, and advanced level students who teach wing chun martial arts and kickboxing in our Lakeland FL studio location. Click on their image to read their bio and see what they have to say about their experience with wing chun kung fu.)

“All the instructors are great, and very friendly. It’s has been an all around fantastic experience for both my daughter and me. Thanks Sifu Och Wing Chun staff for all you do!”

— Natasha R.,

((Parent of kids class student for 6mo +))

Martial Arts & Wing Chun Classes in Lakeland, Florida

WE FOCUS ON REAL WORLD RESULTS while encouraging kids, adults, families, and all individuals through both group and private lessons. Dedicated students interested in learning the full Wing Chun system are welcome to join one of our many programs! Dedicated students interested in learning the entire system of Wing Chun Kung Fu, self defense, cardio kickboxing, kids martial arts, and after school pickup programs are welcome to join any one of our many programs. We are one big martial arts family—training, socializing, and making friends of all ages.

Our Wing Chun Classes

Testimonials

Browse our Testimonials below and see what our students are saying about us! Click on the video button on the top right to view a video testimonial of that student!

What We Do

OUR MISSION IS TO PROVIDE top quality realistic self defense and fitness training for the Central Florida area. We aren’t in the business of giving out belts, but to build strong students who can earn them. Our classes and community are structured to be supportive, motivational, and to keep you striving towards your goals! A lot of martial arts schools say they’re different, we actually are.

Chief Instructor Biography

Sifu Justin Och is Central Florida’s most widely traveled Wing Chun instructor, the only one certified to teach the entire system under all four Ip Man lineages of Moy Yat, Ip Chun, Ip Ching, and Simon Lau. We offer authentic traditional and advanced Modern Combat Wing Chun Kung Fu.

Read More About Sifu Och

“My skills, realistic fighting capabilities, and energy levels have increased. This has been a life changing experience for me and I know it will be for you too!”

— Kaseem M.,

((Student for 6+ years))
